articles.title: National Meeting Marks Anniversary of KPA Founding
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Anniversary of KPA Founding
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the April 25 House of Culture on Wednesday to celebrate the 81st anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, officials of the party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of institutions, factories and enterprises, those of merits in aiding the army, families of service personnel and people in Pyongyang, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies and members of the military attaches corps here and foreign guests.
					
					 KPA General Hyon Yong Chol, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and chief of the KPA General Staff, made a report. He said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army, the first revolutionary armed forces of Juche type on April 25, Juche 21 (1932). This made it possible for the Korean people to have their genuine army for the first time in history and since then there started a new history of the Korean revolution which was hewed out with arms and has won victory and advanced with arms.
					
					 He trained the KPRA into the powerful main force of the anti-Japanese national liberation struggle in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolution, defeated Japanese imperialism and liberated Korea. In the complicated situation of building a new country he realized the cause of building the regular armed forces without delay, led the Fatherland Liberation War to victory and developed the KPA into a heroic army which shattered to smithereens the myth of the U.S. imperialists' "mightiness".
					
					 The Juche-based cause of army-building developed in depth onto a new higher stage thanks to the outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership and Songun politics of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He established the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism as required by the changed reality and developing revolution in the 1990s. He put forward the KPA as the main force for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche on the principle of giving priority to the army over the working class for the first time in history, and put its position and role on the highest level.
					
					 The Korean revolutionary armed forces have grown to be the army of the leader, the party and the people under the care of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, demonstrating its invincible might. They are the greatest patriotic legacy left by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Today the KPA is ushering in greatest heyday of its development as it is led by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					  He set forth the line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and building of nuclear force at the historic March, 2013 plenary meeting of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea. This is a special great event which provided the immortal banner for final victory of the Songun revolution.
					
					 The reporter called for concluding the nuclear showdown with the U.S. with the arms of Paektusan, reunifying the country and winning a final victory in building a thriving socialist nation and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet south Korea are bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean Peninsula despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK, he said, stressing that if another undesired war breaks out due to the unpardonable behaviors of the U.S. imperialists and their followers, the army and people of the DPRK will put an end to the long-standing history of confrontation with the U.S. and bring a bright day of national reunification without fail.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Revolutionary and Patriotic Martyrs
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Revolutionary and Patriotic Martyrs 
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Wreathes were laid before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery on Wednesday on the occasion of the 81st anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army.
					 Seen standing at the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries were wreaths sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Attending the wreath-laying ceremonies were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, the Cabinet, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and Pyongyangites.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets and flowers before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and paid silent tribute to her.
					
					 Laid before the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries were wreaths in the name of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 Also placed there were wreaths in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, units of the KPA and the KPISF, institutions of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, and party and power organs, farms, etc. in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the martyrs who dedicated themselves to the struggle for the liberation of the country, people's freedom and happiness, the reunification of the country and the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The participants went round the cemeteries.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Blasts Foal Eagle Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Blasts Foal Eagle Joint Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released information bulletin No. 1033 Wednesday blasting the U.S.-south Korea Foal Eagle joint military drills that have reached their height.
					 The U.S. and south Korean warmongers have staged a joint landing drill codenamed Ssangyong exercise, a joint drill for unloading goods from ships and munitions support and an emergency runway takeoff and landing drill. They even opened to media those exercises, fanning up the atmosphere for a war against the DPRK.
					
					  The joint landing drill now under way in Phohang, North Kyongsang Province activated marines belonging to the U.S. 3rd marines division based in Okinawa, the U.S. 76th task force, the marine corps of the puppet army and combat troops of Australia which took part in the last Korean war and lots more other aggression troops as well as ultra-modern attack hardware such as rapid vertical take-off and landing helicopter.
					
					 The emergency runway take-off and landing drill due in Yongju, North Kyongsang Province on April 25 with the involvement of F-15K, KF-16 and other warplanes is said to be the first in 22 years since it was last staged in 1991.
					
					 In another development, the U.S. declared its sending of nuclear-powered carrier Nimitz to the Western Pacific on April 22, saying that it will replace carrier John C Stennis to carry out the duties of deterring "provocative acts" such as the north's missile launch and of guarding and monitoring while keeping in touch with Aegis warships deployed in the Western Pacific and nuclear submarines in waters off Guam.
					
					 It was only recently that the U.S. and puppet south Korean group claimed "dwindling the scope of military exercises", "adjusting the level" and "dialogue". Now they are opening to public the north-targeted war drills, a clear proof that they remain unchanged in their hostile policy toward the DPRK and aggression nature and they have become all the more dangerous, instead.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet warmongers' desperate racket for a nuclear war against the DPRK is a serious military provocation to start a war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost. It is also a wanton violation of the DPRK's dignity and sovereignty.
					
					 Through the madcap war exercises the U.S. and the south Korean group seek to make the show of "armed forces", browbeat the DPRK and step up pressure on it but such an act will only reveal their nature as a provoker and aggressor.
					
					 They have staged exercises for nuclear attack on the DPRK with the involvement of three nuclear strategic forces in the U.S. mainland and on Hawaii and Guam. They even brought to south Korea the U.S. marines in Okinawa, pronoun of overseas aggression, and staged huge landing operational exercises together with the south Korean puppet marine corps under the simulated conditions of the DPRK. These can never be called "defensive exercises"
					
					 The U.S. and puppet south Korea's war drills against the DPRK clearly reveal the shameless and deceptive nature of their call for "dialogue".
					
					 As their deceptive farce of "dialogue" did not work on the DPRK, the U.S. and puppet south Korea, by way of revenge, made public to media the war exercises in a desperate bid to step up the pressure on the DPRK. 
					
					 All facts prove that it is none other than the U.S. and the puppet warmongers who are escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula and increasing the danger of a war.
					
					 They are seriously mistaken if they think they can get something from their reckless war frenzy.
					
					 This will instead touch off greater indignation and anger of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will resolutely counter the enemies, not remaining an on-looker to their anti-DPRK war moves.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are maintaining a high alert posture and getting themselves fully ready to make merciless retaliatory blows at the enemies if they make even the slightest provocation. 
					
					 If even a spark is shot up in the territorial land, air and sea of the DPRK, the base of provocation will turn into a sea of fire and the provokers and aggressors will be wiped out.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean forces have to make clear their attitude, whether they stand for dialogue or confrontation, peace or war.
					
					 They should stop the DPRK-targeted war exercises at once and discontinue all hostile acts and provocations against the DPRK if they do not want self-destruction.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Visits South Hwanghae Province to Learn about Farming Situation
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Visits South Hwanghae Province to Learn about Farming Situation 
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, learned about farming situation in South Hwanghae Province.
					 He visited the fertilizer factory and vegetable greenhouse in Haeju City and Chongjong Cooperative Farm in Chongdan County and Pumin Cooperative Farm in Kangryong County where the farmers are all out in farming in the spirit of the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The premier encouraged the agricultural workers who are making efforts to raise good crops to suit to the characteristics of each land and each area and according to the crop growth conditions, standing the bad weather.
					
					 He stressed the need for the farms to introduce the advanced farming method and display the advantages of sub-workteam management system, adding that it is a firm resolution of our party to solve the food problem of the people.
					
					 The premier noted at a consultative meeting that the officials and other people in the agricultural field should boost their responsibilities and roles as the master of farming, bearing in their minds the continued devotion made by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to improve the people's standard of living.
					
					 Discussed there were the issues of producing much organic manure of good quality and fertilizing fields and the issues for relevant units to help the socialist rural countryside materially and technically.
					
					 Pak also learned about the modernization of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill.

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a reply message from Syrian President Bashar Al-Assad.
					 The message expressed thanks to Kim Jong Un for sending kind congratulations to the Syrian president on the independence day, the national holiday of the Syrian Arab Republic, wishing him good health and happiness as well as the friendly Korean people greater progress and prosperity.
					
					 The Syrian president in the message expressed his will to work hard together with Kim Jong Un to steadily strengthen the friendly and cooperative relations between Syria and the DPRK in the interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Victory Is in Store for Koreans in Japan: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Victory Is in Store for Koreans in Japan: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Victory is in store for the Koreans in Japan in their efforts to firmly preserve and develop the national education, the lifeline of patriotic cause, by carrying forward the April 24 struggle for education, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have persistently forced the Koreans to have the "assimilation education" dating back to the colonial period, while talking about the "law on education". Finally they promulgated the notorious "ordinance of closing Korean schools" in January 1948.
					
					 On April 24 tens of thousands of Koreans in Hyogo region had their demand met including the withdrawal of the "ordinance of closing Korean schools", a result of their unflinching fight with the regional authorities.
					
					 The environment around the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan is almost as same as 65 years ago when fascist suppression of the Koreans in Japan was on the rampant.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries took a vicious discrimination step of excluding only the Korean schools from the tuition-free program for senior high schools with sinister intentions to foil the national education and trample down the future of the compatriots' society. At the undisguised instigation of the Japanese authorities, the moves to stop the tuition-free program for Korean schools have taken place in different parts of Japan like a chain reaction.
					
					 The Koreans in Japan have carried on dynamic struggle for defending the right of national education under the Japanese reactionaries' unreasonable discrimination policy, holding high slogans like "Abolition of discrimination policy of national education" and "Achieving equal educational right".
					
					 The national education is the roots of the movement of Koreans in Japan and the lifeline of invariable patriotic cause of Chongryon.
					
					 No matter how desperately the Japanese reactionaries may try to obliterate Chongryon, they can never break the unwavering faith and will of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan who are advancing with the pride and honor of overseas citizens.
					
					 The cause of Chongryon is just and its victory is inevitable.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Censures Japan's Moves to Revive Militarism
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Censures Japan's Moves to Revive Militarism 
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- An increasing number of right-wing reactionaries are visiting Yasukuni Shrine against the backdrop of the trend of Japanese society's extreme lurch to the Right.
					 It was reported that Prime Minister Abe donated a tree called Bitsugi to the shrine since the start of the spring festival on Apr. 21. 
					
					 Deputy Prime Minister Aso, the Minister of General Affairs, the Minister in charge of "Abduction Issue", the Deputy Chief Cabinet Secretary and other high-ranking officials paid a group visit to the shrine.
					
					 Abe's tree donation, to say nothing of the ministers' visits, sparked off strong criticism at home and abroad.
					
					 It was Abe who openly revealed his intention to re-examine the statements made by Murayama and Kono who admitted Japan's past crimes early in February last. It was again Abe who jabbered that he deeply regretted for failing to visit the shrine during his previous office.
					
					 Observers said that Abe donated the tree to the shrine just as he did in 2007 when he was in the office, shelving his visit to it in consideration of public opinion.
					
					 What Abe did is now touching off bitterer resentment than his visit to the shrine in the light of the place to which the donation was made, the timing for it and its poisonous meaning despite his cunning artifice.
					
					 Abe's approach to Yasukuni Shrine which keeps mortuary tablets of top-class Japanese criminals who got ill fames in their aggression against Asian countries and mass-killings in the past constitutes a crucial issue concerning the attitude towards those people of the countries which fell victim to Japan and its crimes in the past.
					
					 That is why the international community is very sensitive to the issues related to the shrine.
					
					 The spring festival at the shrine and an endless donation of such tree is not a simple issue concerning the donation of the tree during spring tree planting season. 
					
					 This brought into bolder relief the black-hearted intention of the Abe Cabinet to make the roots of militarization struck invariably and more deeply in all fabrics of Japan's society with Yasukuni Shrine, symbol of aggression and massacre, as a base.
					
					 Everything from education to details of traditional etiquette, to say nothing of the prime minister's activities and operation of the cabinet and the Diet, is geared to embellishing Japan's past crimes and inciting militarization. This is the present reality of Japan.
					
					 To zealously spread the fascist culture in Japan through visits to the shrine is a reckless action to embark again upon the road of reinvasion by calling back the departed soul of the militarists.  This is an intolerable insult and a wanton challenge to Korea and other Asian countries. It is little short of driving Japan into a historic misfortune.
					
					 The culture of war and fascism forced on Japan is leaving it further isolated and marginalized by other Asian countries and the international community.
					
					 Personages of different social standings of Japan including the representative of the New Komeito Party expressed dissatisfaction that "it is impossible to escape adverse diplomatic impact no matter how hard Abe may explain." They urged his cabinet to make a cautious response, holding that "it is an important factor in politics to pursue diplomacy not to hurt the process for improving relations with neighboring countries."
					
					 The way to Yasukuni Shrine leads to militarization and this will push Japan to self-destruction.
					
					 The venomous roots of militarism struck at Yasukuni Shrine will stretch out like a serpent to the whole Japanese society and swallow it up.

articles.title: Dancing Party of Women's Union Members Held
articles.content:
Dancing Party of Women's Union Members Held
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A dancing party of members of the women's union in Pyongyang took place at the plaza of the Arch of Triumph on Wednesday on the occasion of the 81st anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army.
					 The dancing party began to the tune of songs "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and "Song of the Korean People's Army".
					
					 The participants presented dances, recollecting with deep emotion the undying feats Kim Il Sung performed by laying down the Juche-based line of building the revolutionary armed forces, founding the revolutionary army, the true army of the people, and defeating two imperialisms in one generation with his extraordinary wisdom, outstanding commanding art, iron will and matchless grit.
					
					 They also danced to the tune of "Our General Is Best" and "Let's Sing of Army-People Unity" and other songs. They expressed boundless reverence for the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il who strengthened the KPA into the army strong in idea and faith and matchless elite army and put the dignity and national power of socialist Korea onto the highest level, holding high the banner of Songun.
					
					 The festive atmosphere of the dancing party picked up when the band played "Song of Women", "Bellflower", "Ongheya" and other songs reflecting the pride and self-esteem of the Korean women leading a worthy life in the socialist homeland defended by the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army.
					
					 The dancing party ended with song "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Cost of Our Lives". It truthfully represented the revolutionary enthusiasm of the Korean women to positively contribute to the struggle to defend the country and achieve prosperity in the spirit of the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Workers' Party of Korea under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Delegation of Politicians from Various Political Parties of Europe Tours Pyongyang
articles.content:
Delegation of Politicians from Various Political Parties of Europe Tours Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A delegation of politicians from various political parties of Europe headed by Chief Executive Officer of Inter Mediate Jonathan Powell, former Downing Street Chief of Staff to Prime Minister Tony Blair, visited the People's Open-air Ice Rink Wednesday.
					 They went round different places of the rink, being briefed on the fact that modern sports base has appeared on the picturesque bank of Taedong River.
					
					 They also visited the National Gifts Exhibition House, Kyongsang Kindergarten, etc.

articles.title: WIPO Top Prizes Awarded to DPRK Inventors
articles.content:
WIPO Top Prizes Awarded to DPRK Inventors
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Top inventor prizes and medals of the World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO) were conferred on inventors of the DPRK.
					 The awarding ceremony took place Wednesday.
					
					 The awardees included Jon Hyong Su, room chief of Pyongyang University of Architecture, Kim Chol Hyok, post-graduate student of the university, Hong Song Hyok, designer of the Management Bureau for the Preservation of the Revolutionary Sites, and Pang Chol Min, student of Kim Chaek University of Technology. They contributed to the construction of monuments by completing the three dimensional curve space stoning method. O Kwang Won, director general of Korea Jangsu Trading Corporation, Kim Chol Gon, section chief of the corporation, and Kang Song Su, its staff, also received prizes and medals for producing Kaesong Koryo Insam powder and inventing its production method. The Insam powder can be used as ingredient for a variety of food and is good for increasing immunity and also efficacious for treatment and prevention of diseases.
					
					 The WIPO decided to award top inventor prizes to those who were highly appreciated at the 12th national invention and new technological presentation held last year.

articles.title: Book Explanation Contest Held
articles.content:
Book Explanation Contest Held 
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The 15th national book explanation contest of publications distributors took place in Pyongyang from April 22 to 24.
					 The contest brought together more than 300 officials and workers in the field of publications distribution selected from all provinces. It was held divided into collective and individual contests.
					
					 The contesters used various forms and methods for the explanation of books dealing with the great personalities of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu, collection of revolutionary anecdotes and books of literature and arts.

articles.title: Nigerian Embassy Staff Put Bouquets before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Nigerian Embassy Staff Put Bouquets before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Nwofe Alexander, Nigerian ambassador to the DPRK, and his staff members visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Wednesday on the occasion of the 81st anniversary of the Korean People's Army. 
					 They placed bouquets before the statues in reverence for the peerlessly great men and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Seriously Burned Soldiers Completely Cured
articles.content:
Seriously Burned Soldiers Completely Cured
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Yun Kwang Jin and Kim Un Hyok, soldiers of the Korean People's Army, who had gotten serious burns on their bodies, were completely cured and left the Kangwon Provincial People's Hospital thanks to the sincere devotion of its medical staff and people of Wonsan City. 
					 They were admitted to the hospital on February 20 after getting two or three degree burns on 15 percent of their bodies.
					
					 They threw themselves into the house in raising flames to safely retrieve the portraits of smiling great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and rescue its several family members.
					
					 A series of doctors consultations took place and an intensive treatment campaign was conducted day and night at the hospital.
					
					 Doctors and nurses made long trips day and night to obtain precious medical herbs and nutritious food good for the treatment of the patients. The hospital did its best to prepare varieties of special food at each meal time. Cooperation with renowned medical workers of other units helped increase the efficacy of the treatment and restore the patients' original faces. 
					
					 Many officials and other workers in Kangwon Province and Wonsan City visited the soldiers.
					
					 They provided a lot of tonic and nutritious food to the soldiers, who showed such noble spiritual world of the revolutionary army and protected the lives and properties of people, wishing them earliest possible recovery. 
					
					  The soldiers departed from the hospital amid the warm send-off of the medical workers and employees of the hospital on Wednesday on the threshold of the founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: Top Prize Awarded to Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee
articles.content:
Top Prize Awarded to Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee
						
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The top special prize and its diploma and indoor display gold prize and its diploma of the 11th China Azalea Show were awarded to the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee.
					 Displayed at the Korean wing of the show were more than 100 potted Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias in full bloom and photos and pamphlets on top prizes the immortal flowers received at horticultural expos in different countries.
					
					 The prizes and their diplomas were awarded to the head of the DPRK delegation by the secretary of the Jian City, Jiangxi Province, Committee of the Communist Party of China at the opening ceremony of the show held on April 20.
					
					 The secretary said: I am very pleased that Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias, famous flowers of the DPRK, are on display at the 11th China Azalea Show. Those flowers are very beautiful and elegant. These famous flowers made the show conspicuous.
					
					 Attending the 11th China Azalea Show in Jinggangshan City, Jiangxi Province were the DPRK and other countries and regions and more than 30 provincial and city organizations of China.

articles.title: New Postage Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Postage Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea issued two kinds of stamps, in reflection of the spirit of the March 2013 plenary meeting of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and in commemoration of the law on the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun adopted at the Seventh Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly.
					 Seen in one of the stamps are letters reading "Line of simultaneously carrying on the economic construction and the building of nuclear forces", "March 2013 plenary meeting of the WPK Central Committee" and "March 31, Juche 102 (2013)". The stamp depicts a serviceperson and a smelter symbolizing the army and people determined to carry through the WPK's new strategic line.
					
					 Another round stamp carries in its upper part the letters reading "In commemoration of the adoption of the law on the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun" and "April 1, Juche 102 (2013)". Portrayed in its center is the palace where President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il lie in state.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Organization Dismisses U.S. Proposal for Dialogue as Hypocritical
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Organization Dismisses U.S. Proposal for Dialogue as Hypocritical 
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. released a commentary on April 19 slamming the shameless move of the U.S.
					 The commentary accused the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers of kicking off Ssangyong drills and going busy with joint logistic support training in the area of Phohang from April 18.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 Huge troops including the U.S. forces overseas and ultra-modern war hardware have been introduce into south Korea for the drill which will last till April 28.
					
					 This drill through which the U.S. pursues a clear aim to invade the DPRK proves that the U.S. proposed dialogue is nothing but hypocrisy as it lacks sincerity.
					
					 Such joint military exercise further increases the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula. The U.S. is so mean as to talk about dialogue before its partner while staging military drills for aggression behind the scene.
					
					 This is little short of clarifying that the U.S. has no intention to have dialogue with the north.
					
					 It was quite natural for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK to have put forth the three demands through its statement.
					
					 The U.S. should stop the act of escalating the military tension on the peninsula at once and sincerely meet the said demands and opt for dialogue.

articles.title: S. Korea Urged to Stop Anti-DPRK Provocation Moves If It Wants Dialogue
articles.content:
S. Korea Urged to Stop Anti-DPRK Provocation Moves If It Wants Dialogue
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces dismissed the DPRK's principled stand to south Korea's proposal for dialogue as "incomprehensible and improper act" and called on the DPRK to make a "correct option".
					 Lurking behind this is a sinister intention to shift the blame for the tension on the Korean Peninsula on to the DPRK, says Minju Joson Wednesday in a bylined commentary.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet south Korea are directly behind the war-like situation created on the peninsula, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK has demanded south Korea to apologize for the hostile acts it committed against the DPRK pursuant to the U.S. and stop such acts. This is quite just demand. There is nothing incomprehensible in it.
					
					 What is not understandable is south Korean puppet forces impertinently admonishing the DPRK to make a "correct option". The DPRK's possession of nuclear weapons was the most correct option based on a historical lesson. The DPRK learned from decades-long confrontation with the U.S. that strength must be coped with strength and nuclear weapons with nuclear weapons.
					
					 Without strength it is impossible to defend the sovereignty and the dignity of the country and nation. So, it is clearly to every one that there can not be dialogue for denuclearization at present.
					
					 The puppet south Korea has to immediately stop anti-DPRK provocation acts and apologize for them if it has true intent to hold dialogue with the DPRK. There will be neither DPRK-U.S. talks nor DPRK-s. Korea talks as long as the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and the puppet south Korea's anti-DPRK war moves pursuant to the U.S. go on.
					
					 The DPRK is unchanged in its principled stand that it can not sit at a negotiating table with tricksters engrossed in anti-DPRK smear campaign.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Accept DPRK's Preconditions for Dialogue
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Accept DPRK's Preconditions for Dialogue
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- High-ranking officials of the U.S. said they hoped that the north would stop "threats and provocation" and come out to the negotiating table. They are asserting that the door to dialogue is open and the ball is in the north's court.
					 Clear is that the U.S. dialogue strategy is a product of its sordid design to shift the blame for the aggravated situation on the Korean Peninsula on to the DPRK and push the DPRK into a predicament with a fresh pretext, says Minju Joson Wednesday in a bylined commentary.
					
					 If the U.S. truly hopes for discussing the issue of easing tension on the peninsula with the DPRK, it has to respect the latter's sovereignty and should not set the dismantlement of nuclear program as a precondition for dialogue, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The nuclear dismantlement which the U.S. set as a precondition for dialogue is aimed to force the DPRK to disarm itself and, furthermore, make the public convince that the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK is a root cause of the tension running high on the peninsula.
					
					 The same is the case with the stop to "provocation" which the U.S. raised as another precondition for dialogue.
					
					 As for the provocation, it is what the DPRK should say to the U.S.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, through the dialogue proposal, the U.S. seeks to shirk the responsibility for stoking the tension on the peninsula, brand the DPRK's nuclear deterrence as a root cause of the tension and stain the DPRK as a "provoker". 
					
					 Can there be communication of words even though the DPRK sits at a negotiating table with the U.S. which nurses such a sinister intention.
					
					 If the U.S. has true willingness to sit with the DPRK and settle issues in a peaceful manner, it has to state in public its stand to accept the DPRK's preconditions for dialogue as clarified in the statement of the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Make Public Plan of Combined Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Make Public Plan of Combined Drill
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- It was reported that the 11th mechanized infantry division of the south Korean puppet army will stage a combined drill for countering infiltration in Hongchon area in South Korean Kangwon Province between April 24 and 25, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The warmongers blustered that the drill is to shape a joint defence posture of civilians, government, army and police to respond to "provocation" of someone.
					
					 The plan envisions the activation of war hardware including tanks, armored cars and helicopters.
					
					 The trigger-happy elements in south Korea buoyed by the anti-north war fever are escalating confrontation by waging various kinds of war drills including the Foal Eagle joint military drills in league with the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Organization Dismisses U.S. Proposal for Dialogue as Hypocritical
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Organization Dismisses U.S. Proposal for Dialogue as Hypocritical 
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. released a commentary on April 19 slamming the shameless move of the U.S.
					 The commentary accused the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers of kicking off Ssangyong drills and going busy with joint logistic support training in the area of Phohang from April 18.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 Huge troops including the U.S. forces overseas and ultra-modern war hardware have been introduce into south Korea for the drill which will last till April 28.
					
					 This drill through which the U.S. pursues a clear aim to invade the DPRK proves that the U.S. proposed dialogue is nothing but hypocrisy as it lacks sincerity.
					
					 Such joint military exercise further increases the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula. The U.S. is so mean as to talk about dialogue before its partner while staging military drills for aggression behind the scene.
					
					 This is little short of clarifying that the U.S. has no intention to have dialogue with the north.
					
					 It was quite natural for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK to have put forth the three demands through its statement.
					
					 The U.S. should stop the act of escalating the military tension on the peninsula at once and sincerely meet the said demands and opt for dialogue.

articles.title: U.S. Call for "Dialogue" Is Smokescreen to Cover Up Its War Moves: News Analyst
articles.content:
U.S. Call for "Dialogue" Is Smokescreen to Cover Up Its War Moves: News Analyst
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The United States has recently stepped up the preparations for a war to invade the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, amassing nuclear armed forces in its military bases around the Korean Peninsula.
					 On April 16, a nuclear submarine loaded with Tomahawk cruise missiles made a port-call in Guam, joining six nuclear-powered submarines already deployed there, the biggest number since 2001.
					
					 On Apr. 19, nuclear-powered carrier Nimitz was reportedly dispatched to the west Pacific from the U.S. mainland.
					
					 All the facts show that the U.S. decided to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK. This also proves that its scheme for a nuclear war has entered the final stage of preparations for its implementation.
					
					 It is unprecedented in the history of DPRK-U.S. confrontation that such huge nuclear war hardware and means of various types have been amassed as now.
					
					 After all, "dialogue" and "negotiations" called for by the U.S. are nothing but a smokescreen to cover up its war moves.
					
					 Anyhow, it is foolish for the U.S. to attempt to browbeat the DPRK with such "sophisticated weapons". Sophisticated weapon is no longer a monopoly of the U.S.
					
					 It is the unshakable stand of the DPRK service personnel and civilians to counter the U.S. imperialists' nuclear blackmail with a merciless nuclear attack, and war of aggression with an all-out war of justice.
					
					 The current ill-boding movements on the part of the U.S will only harden the DPRK's strong will to demonstrate physical strength.

articles.title: S. Korea Urged to Stop Anti-DPRK Provocation Moves If It Wants Dialogue
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Accept DPRK's Preconditions for Dialogue
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- High-ranking officials of the U.S. said they hoped that the north would stop "threats and provocation" and come out to the negotiating table. They are asserting that the door to dialogue is open and the ball is in the north's court.
					 Clear is that the U.S. dialogue strategy is a product of its sordid design to shift the blame for the aggravated situation on the Korean Peninsula on to the DPRK and push the DPRK into a predicament with a fresh pretext, says Minju Joson Wednesday in a bylined commentary.
					
					 If the U.S. truly hopes for discussing the issue of easing tension on the peninsula with the DPRK, it has to respect the latter's sovereignty and should not set the dismantlement of nuclear program as a precondition for dialogue, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The nuclear dismantlement which the U.S. set as a precondition for dialogue is aimed to force the DPRK to disarm itself and, furthermore, make the public convince that the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK is a root cause of the tension running high on the peninsula.
					
					 The same is the case with the stop to "provocation" which the U.S. raised as another precondition for dialogue.
					
					 As for the provocation, it is what the DPRK should say to the U.S.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, through the dialogue proposal, the U.S. seeks to shirk the responsibility for stoking the tension on the peninsula, brand the DPRK's nuclear deterrence as a root cause of the tension and stain the DPRK as a "provoker". 
					
					 Can there be communication of words even though the DPRK sits at a negotiating table with the U.S. which nurses such a sinister intention.
					
					 If the U.S. has true willingness to sit with the DPRK and settle issues in a peaceful manner, it has to state in public its stand to accept the DPRK's preconditions for dialogue as clarified in the statement of the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.

U.S. Urged to Accept DPRK's Preconditions for Dialogue

S. Korean Warmongers Make Public Plan of Combined Drill
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- It was reported that the 11th mechanized infantry division of the south Korean puppet army will stage a combined drill for countering infiltration in Hongchon area in South Korean Kangwon Province between April 24 and 25, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The warmongers blustered that the drill is to shape a joint defence posture of civilians, government, army and police to respond to "provocation" of someone.

articles.title: Declaration on Situation for Peace on Korean Peninsula Published
articles.content:
Declaration on Situation for Peace on Korean Peninsula Published
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The All-People Solidarity for Peace on Korean Peninsula in south Korea released a declaration on the situation in Seoul on April 21, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The declaration said that the distrust between the south and the north has reached an extreme phase as evidenced by the crisis in the Kaesong Industrial Zone.
					
					 The Korean Peninsula is standing at the crossroads of whether it will suffer from a war disaster or the nation will prosper by achieving peace, it noted.
					
					 The primary responsibility for the prevailing situation rests with Lee Myung Bak who derailed dialogue, exchange and cooperation between the south and the north, it held.
					
					 Peace guarantees the future of the nation, it said, calling upon all people to pool efforts for preventing a war.
					
					 It demanded the U.S. opt for concluding a treaty for peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Court Admits Villains' Killings of Civilians during Korean War
articles.content:
S. Korean Court Admits Villains' Killings of Civilians during Korean War
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Seoul Central District Court admitted the mass killings of civilians committed by Villains in Ryoju, Kyonggi Province during the past Korean war, south Korean KBS reported on April 22.
					 It was reported that south Korean puppet troops and police shot to death a group of residents in Ryoju County on the mere reason that they helped the Korean People's Army or were their family members in September 1950.
					
					 The south Korean Committee for Settling the Past History for Truth and Reconciliation investigated the case in 2009 and made public the results of its inquiry that more than 90 persons were killed in those days.
					
					 The "government" cannot evade the responsibility for the massacre of civilians in Ryoju by use of power, the court held that reparation should be made for the bereaved families.

articles.title: Peerlessly Great Men Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Peerlessly Great Men Praised by Foreign Figures 
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Russia, Switzerland, Tanzania and Pakistan on April 12 and 13 on the occasions of the 101st birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) and the 20th anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia praised Kim Il Sung as the great leader who dedicated himself to the people's happiness with total dedication.
					
					 The DPRK could demonstrate its dignity as the socialist power recognized by the world, and the Korean People's Army its might as invincible revolutionary armed forces as it held aloft the banner of the Juche idea and Songun idea founded by him, the chairperson said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il performed great feats for strengthening socialist Korea. It is a great fortune of the Korean people to hold Kim Jong Un as their supreme leader in high esteem. It is thanks to him that the Korean people will certainly build a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The chairman of the Swiss preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun and other speakers said that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il led the Korean revolution to victory and glory and made great contributions to carrying out the socialist cause, the cause of national reunification and global independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups, the chief of the Karachi Youth and Students Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Pakistan and other speakers praised the sacred revolutionary lives of the peerlessly great men, adding the future of Korea is rosy as it is led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of Uganda, Nigeria and Syria carried special write-ups to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The Ugandan paper Sun Rise on April 12 carried an article titled "Father of the people" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He was not only the leader of a country but tender-hearted father who looked after the people's life and destiny in a responsible manner.
					
					 Thanks to his warm love for the people, universal free healthcare and free education have been enforced in the DPRK since long ago and it has considered it as an overriding principle of its party and state activities to improve the people's standard of living. 
					
					 He regarded the people as his beloved sons and daughters. He, therefore, made ceaseless journeys for field guidance, without having any rest even on his birthday. 
					
					 The benign image of the tender-hearted father Kim Il Sung is deeply cherished not only by the Korean people but by progressive mankind.
					
					 The Nigerian paper Nigerian Observer on April 11 in an article titled "The eternal sun of Juche" noted that he started the Korean revolution with arms and established a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence on this land by dint of arms.
					
					 It recalled that he rendered positive support and encouragement to the world progressive people in their struggle against imperialism and for the building of a new society.
					
					 He is always alive as the sun of Juche as he dedicated his all to the successful advance of the human cause of independence, it added.
					
					 The Syrian paper Al Baath on April 11 carried an article praising the immortal Songun leadership feats of Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed by Foreign Media 
						
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Radio and TV broadcasting  services of various countries aired special programs between April 3 and 15 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The State Radio Broadcasting Service of Cambodia aired a program under the title of "Great man of the century" as follows:
					
					 Though Kim Il Sung passed away, he is always revered by humankind as a great man of the century. 
					
					 He was a peerless statesman who made an undying contribution to the cause of global independence with his extraordinary leadership.
					
					 His exploits will last forever along with human history. He was a peerlessly great man who attracted all people for his exceptionally noble personality. He will be immortal as he is like the sun, 
					
					 FM 90.5 Radio of this country aired the similar program.
					
					 The Guinean Radio of Seven National Languages in an article titled "Immortal flower Kimilsungia" said that the flower of the sun named after the peerlessly great man is in full bloom throughout the world.
					
					 The Syrian Radio aired a congratulatory program under the title "On the occasion of the Day of the Sun".
					
					 Its Central TV Broadcasting Service televised the revolutionary activities of the President under the caption of "Special program to mark the Day of the Sun".
					
					 The Lao State TV and Malaysian TV showed films introducing the grand monumental buildings and picturesque places in the DPRK and its policies for people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded by Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Personages of various countries after attending Korean film shows held from April 12 to 18 highly praised the dear respected Kim Jong Un for leading the DPRK to win victory after victory in the stand-off with the U.S. 
					 The director of a Mongolian company said watching films on the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Arch of Triumph and others built in praise of President Kim Il Sung's exploits he had opportunities to know better about the fact that the idea and cause of the President have been successfully carried forward generation after generation in the DPRK.
					
					 It was thanks to the President and general secretary Kim Jong Il that the DPRK could always emerge victorious, resolutely foiling the U.S. moves for aggression.
					
					 The director of another Mongolian company said:
					
					 I keenly realized the courage and pluck of the dear respected Kim Jong Un in the course of following the recent developments on the Korean Peninsula. He is another great man produced by Korea. Thanks to him, the DPRK is demonstrating its might as a power steering the world politics.
					
					 The head in charge of export in Plastic Injection Company of Indonesia said he got to know well about the tremendous national power of the DPRK after watching a film.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear threat forced the DPRK to have access to nukes, he said, adding he is very envious of the latter which is firmly reacting to the high-handed policy of the former with the toughest stand.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will surely win victory in the showdown with the U.S. as they are led by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, another great brilliant commander.
					
					 Participants of the film shows were held in Mongolia, Indonesia, Ethiopia and the Czech Republic to mark April 15, birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung. Korean films shown included "Reply of Korea" and "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation".

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Il Sung Lauded Abroad
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Il Sung Lauded Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Meetings, film shows and seminars took place in Democratic Congo and Pakistan from Apr. 12 to 15 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Korean films shown included "Pyongyang Today" and "International Friendship Exhibition House".
					
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo, said in his speech at the meeting that Kim Il Sung founded the immortal Juche idea, opening up the era of independence and greatly contributing to the Korean revolution and the accomplishment of global independence.
					
					 The great exploits performed by the President for the human cause of independence will last forever, he said, adding that the DPRK would emerge victorious in the confrontation with the U.S. and build a thriving nation as it holds the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					 The executive secretary of the Gombe, Kinshasa, Regional Committee of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of Democratic Congo, said that the idea and exploits of Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il serve as an eternal foundation for the prosperity of socialist Korea.
					
					 Noting that the DPRK is demonstrating its might as a satellite-manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, he expressed confidence that the DPRK would win a final victory in an all-out confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 Berkat Ullah, chairman of the Pakistani Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea, in a speech praised the revolutionary life of the President, stressing that he would always be alive in the hearts of mankind.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings held in Matete District in Kinshasa of Democratic Congo and Karachi in Pakistan.

articles.title: Figures of Russia, Nepal Accuse U.S. of Its Moves to Stifle DPRK
articles.content:
Figures of Russia, Nepal Accuse U.S. of Its Moves to Stifle DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Personages of Russia and Nepal released statements on Apr. 9 and 13 in denunciation of the U.S. evermore escalating moves to stifle the DPRK.
					 Maltseva, assistant professor of the Far Eastern State University of Russia, said that the present grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula is entirely attributable to the large-scale joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. against the DPRK.
					
					 All the measures taken by the DPRK are to defend the sovereignty of the country and the nation, the professor said, adding that the U.S. and its followers are to blame for the current situation on the peninsula.
					
					 Manik Lama, chairman of the Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics, said: The U.S. set up its military bases in different parts of the world including south Korea in a bid to openly meddle in internal affairs of other countries and invade them.
					
					 The U.S. and its satellite forces prodded the UN Security Council into cooking up an illegal "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 It, at the same time, staged provocative nuclear war drills against the DPRK, seriously threatening the sovereignty and dignity of the Korean people and pushing the situation on the peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 As a result, the dark clouds of a nuclear war are hanging over the peninsula.
					
					 To cope with this situation the DPRK declared its stand to turn out in an all-out action against provocateurs. 
					
					 We urge the U.S. and its followers to immediately stop their moves for aggression.
					
					 For lasting peace on the Korean Peninsula we demand the U.S. withdraw its aggressor troops from south Korea at once and the UNSC rescind all the "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Will Never Be Taken in by U.S. Trick: British Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK Will Never Be Taken in by U.S. Trick: British Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement in denunciation of the U.S. deceptive dialogue ballad on April 17.
					 The U.S. offered the dialogue to deceive the world people and evade the responsibility for escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The situation on the peninsula was deteriorated due to the U.S. reinforcing its military troops in south Korea and staging joint military drills.
					
					 The U.S. called for dialogue with the DPRK while resorting to war drills against the latter. It is the height of shamelessness.
					
					 It is as same as forcing the other party at gunpoint to sit for dialogue.
					
					 It is the purpose of the U.S. to disarm and suffocate the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK holding fast to the line of Juche, independence and Songun is not a country that will be taken in by the U.S. cunning ploy.
					
					 We accuse the U.S. of its deceptive dialogue ballad and support the DPRK's stand to toughen the military countermeasures for self-defence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Polish Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Polish Website
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The full text of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was posted on the Polish website The Democratic People's Republic of Korea on April 15.
					 This speech made by Kim Jong Un at the military parade for celebrating the centenary of the birth of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation is a history which proves the immutable truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and nation.
					
					 It indicates tasks for demonstrating the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carrying out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Brazilian Organization
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The full text of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's report at the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was posted on the website of the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea on April 17.
					 The report made by him on March 31, Juche 102 (2013), clarifies a new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and building of nuclear force as required by the prevailing situation and the developing Korean revolution. It also indicates tasks and ways to carry it out.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Romania, France
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Romania, France
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Meetings for remembering President Kim Il Sung were held in Romania and France on April 11 and 12.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, said the President was born in Mangyongdae on April 15, 1912 and grew up under the influence of the patriotic and revolutionary parents.
					
					 It was thanks to the great Juche idea founded by him that the working masses could wage a courageous struggle to achieve independence as the masters of their own destinies, the chairman said, adding:
					
					 When looking back upon the ever-victorious history of the Korean revolution, we can know well about his ideo-theoretical wisdom, leadership art and noble virtue.
					
					 Thanks to HE Kim Jong Un the undying exploits performed by the President are shining more brilliantly and they will always be cherished not only by the Korean people but by the world progressives.
					
					 Jean Marie Lambret, chief of the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Idea, said the group recollects with humblest reverence the undying exploits performed by the President for the human cause of independence.
					
					 The President's revolutionary cause of Juche was successfully carried forward by general secretary Kim Jong Il and has victoriously advanced under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the chief said, adding:
					
					 Despite the vicious moves of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK, the Korean people are further glorifying the undying exploits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and winning victory after victory in their showdown with the U.S., united close around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We will always support the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded by Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded by Brazilian Organization
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A special write-up was posted on the website of the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK on April 12 on the first anniversaries of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's election to the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the state.
					 An article titled "The great man, beaming with a broad smile" illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Un together with children was posted on the website.
					
					 The article said Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the struggle of the WPK, army and people of the DPRK to build a thriving socialist country and protect the sovereignty of the country and dignity of the nation.
					
					 Media of different countries carry photos of Kim Jong Un, his face beaming with a broad smile, every day, the article noted, adding his smile is attracting all people.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 His broad smile reflects the personality of a great father who takes people to his arms with warm loving care.
					
					 Inspired by his broad smile, the Korean people are making fresh achievements day by day full of confidence of sure victory, firmly believing in the prosperous future of the country. 
					
					 His broad smile also reflects the complacency of the strong confident of a final victory in the showdown with the imperialists.
					
					 All people were struck with admiration at confident Kim Jong Un who was visiting the island defence detachments in the biggest hotspot in the western sector of the front, his face beaming with a broad smile, after reaching there by a small wooden boat.
					
					 The Korean people will always emerge victorious, inspired by his broad smile.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Russian Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Russian Papers
						
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Russian papers carried special write-ups on March 27 and 28 to mark the first anniversaries of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's election to the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state.
					 The Russian paper Vladivostok carried an article titled "What does Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un's inspection to Panmunjom mean?" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 His inspection to Panmunjom in March last year stunned the world, the paper said, and went on: His inspection demonstrated his resolute decision and will to achieve a sure victory by standing against those keen to violate the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK without any slight compromise or concession.
					
					 Through the inspection he showed his strong resolution not to pardon any military provocation of the hostile forces.
					
					 The inspection was a demonstration of his firm determination to achieve the country's reunification at any cost, true to the intention of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 His inspection of Panmunjom convinced the world once again of his matchless grit and pluck.
					
					 No one can provoke the DPRK led by him.
					
					 It is as clear as daylight that Korea's reunification will be achieved by him.
					
					 The Russian paper Our Home Sochi allotted its one whole page to an article "Iron-willed brilliant commander" illustrated with his photos.
					
					 The DPRK will always emerge victorious as he is leading the army and people, the article stressed.

articles.title: Acto central por el 81o aniversario de fundacion del EPC
articles.content:
Acto central por el 81o aniversario de fundacion del EPC
 Pyongyang, 24 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar con solemnidad este miercoles en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 81o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea, fuerzas armadas revolucionarias del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					 Asistieron a la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de los organos, fabricas y empresas en esta capital, los benemeritos en el apoyo al ejercito, familiares de los militares en servicio, trabajadores, representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang y compatriotas en ultramar. 
					
					 Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y de organizaciones internacionales, miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares, acreditados en Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					 El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del general de ejercito del EPC Hyon Yong Chol, miembro suplente del Comite Central del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC.
					
					 El informante dijo que gracias a la fundacion el 25 de abril del 21 (1932) de la Era Juche del Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea (ERPC), primeras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de tipo jucheano por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, el pueblo coreano pudo tener por primera vez en la historia su propio ejercito y desde entonces se inicio la nueva era de la revolucion coreana, iniciada, triunfada y avanzada con las fuerzas armadas. 
					
					 Al formar el ERPC como grueso de la lucha por la liberacion nacional en el fragor de la revolucion antijaponesa, el Presidente vencio el imperialismo japones y libero la patria, recordo y agrego que en la situacion complicada de la construccion de la nueva patria, este gran hombre realizo sin demora la causa de construccion de las fuerzas armadas regulares y condujo a la victoria la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, de modo que el EPC, ejercito heroico, hiciera anicos el mito de "supremacia" del imperialismo norteamericano. 
					
					 La autoctona causa de construccion del ejercito se desarrollo en una nueva etapa elevada por la destacada politica de Songun y destacada guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, dijo y continuo:
					
					 En la decada de los 90 del siglo pasado, el Dirigente establecio la politica de Songun como principal modo politico socialista de acuerdo con la demanda de la realidad cambiada y la revolucion en desarrollo y presento por primera vez en la historia el EPC como grueso para el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche en el principio de "ejercito primero, clase obrera despues" y elevo al maximo la posicion y papel del EPC.
					
					 Las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias coreanas, fortalecidas como invencible ejercito del lider, el partido y el pueblo bajo la minuciosa atencion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, devienen maxima herencia patriotica de los grandes Generalisimos.
					
					 Hoy dia, el EPC acoge la era de prosperidad de su desarrollo bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del EPC.
					
					 El Mariscal presento en el historico pleno de marzo de 2013 del Comite Central del PTC la linea sobre el desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares, lo cual es un acontecimiento especial que asegura la victoria final de la Revolucion del Songun. 
					
					 Debemos terminar con las fuerzas armadas del monte Paektu la batalla nuclear antiyanqui, reunificar la patria y lograr la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista y la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					 Ahora Estados Unidos y los traidores surcoreanos acarrean el nubarron de la guerra nuclear, pese a la reiterada advertencia de la RPDC. 
					
					 En caso de que se desate otra vez la guerra no deseada debido a la imprudencia intolerable de los imperialistas yanquis y sus satelites, el ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC pondran el punto final a la historia de confrontacion con EE.UU. y acogera el dia de reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: ACNC estigmatiza visita al santuario Yasukuni de insulto a Corea y otros paises asiaticos
articles.content:
ACNC estigmatiza visita al santuario Yasukuni de insulto a Corea y otros paises asiaticos
 Pyongyang, 24 de abril (ACNC) -- En estos dias, en la sociedad japonesa se hace frecuente la visita de los reaccionarios derechistas al santuario Yasukuni.
					 Con motivo de la ceremonia primaveral en memoria de difuntos, iniciada el pasado dia 21, el premier japones Abe entrego regalos al santuario Yasukuni y lo visitaron en grupos el vicepremier Aso y otros funcionarios de alto rango, provocando gran preocupacion de los nacionales y extranjeros. 
					
					 A principios de febrero, Abe expreso abiertamente el intento de revisar las declaraciones de Murayama y Kono que reconocieron los crimenes del pasado de Japon y dijo que "es muy lamentable que no haya visitado el santuario Yasukuni en su primer mandato al frente del gabinete". 
					
					 Tomando en consideracion la opinion publica, los medios interesados transmitieron que como lo hizo en el periodo de su primer mandato, Abe dejo de visitar el santuario y entrego solo el arbol de Bitsugi. 
					
					 La posicion sobre el santuario Yasukuni, donde estan conservados los restos morales de los criminales de guerra de grado especial que ganaron mala fama en las masacres y las agresiones a los paises asiaticos, es una cuestion de actitud y punto de vista sobre los pueblos de los paises victimas y la criminalidad cometida en el pasado, razon por la cual la sociedad internacional trata con seriedad la visita al santuario Yasukuni. 
					
					 En fin de cuentas, la ceremonia primaveral en el santuario Yasukuni y la entrega de Bitsugi no son una simple donacion de un arbol para la plantacion primaveral, sino revelan la malsana intencion del gabinete de Abe de infundir mas el ambiente de militarizacion en toda la sociedad japonesa tomando por base el santuario Yasukuni, simbolo de agresion y asesinato.
					
					 Hoy en dia, en el pais isleno desde las actividades del premier y la gestion del gabinete y la dieta hasta la educacion y las costumbres tradicionales se han convertido en un espacio para embellecer la historia criminal e inculcar el militarismo. 
					
					 La implantacion de la cultura fascista en Japon a traves de la visita al santuario Yasukuni es una imprudencia tendente a rehabilitar el militarismo y emprender la nueva agresion y resulta un insulto intolerable y provocacion a Corea y otros paises asiaticos y un crimen que acarrea las desgracias historicas al pais isleno.
					
					 Por la difusion de la cultura de guerra y la fascista, Japon se ve aislado por los paises asiaticos y la sociedad internacional. 
					
					 Es por eso que el representante del Partido Komeito y otras personalidades de distintos estratos de Japon urgieron al gabinete de Abe a tomar las medidas serias diciendo con descontento que "de ninguna manera podra eludir la influencia diplomatica negativa" y que "el beneficio favorable a la mejora de las relaciones" con los paises vecinos es "un importante elemento de la politica". 
					
					 La visita al santuario Yasukuni llevara a Japon a la militarizacion y a la autodestruccion.

articles.title: RPDC no se enganara por ardid de EE.UU., afirman entidades britanicas
articles.content:
RPDC no se enganara por ardid de EE.UU., afirman entidades britanicas
 Pyongyang, 24 de abril (ACNC) -- La Asociacion de Estudio de la Politica de Songun y el Grupo de Estudio de la Idea Juche, de Gran Bretana, y la sucursal britanica de la Asociacion de Amistad con Corea rechazaron en su declaracion conjunta fechada 17 la insistencia en dialogo hipocrita de Estados Unidos.
					 La nota revela que el dialogo de que habla el imperio norteamericano no pasa de ser una artimana para enganar la opinion publica mundial y eludir la responsabilidad por la agravacion de la tension de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					 La situacion de esta region se ha empeorado por EE.UU. que aumenta sus fuerzas armadas agresoras en el suelo surcoreano y libra los ejercicios militares conjuntos, asevera y agrega que hablar del dialogo recurriendo a la campana de guerra contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea es el climax del cinismo igual a demandar el dialogo a la contraparte apuntandole el fusil. 
					
					 Prosigue que EE.UU. exige el desarme de la RPDC, en lugar de reconocer su culpabilidad por la agravacion de la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y revocar la injusta "sancion" anti-RPDC.
					
					 EE.UU. persigue el objetivo de desarmar y derrocar la RPDC, pero esta mantiene con firmeza la linea del Juche, la independencia y el Songun y no se enganara jamas por la astucia de ese imperio, apunta.
					
					 Por ultimo, denuncia la insistencia hipocrita en dialogo de EE.UU. y manifiesta el apoyo a la posicion de la RPDC de intensificar las contramedidas militares de autodefensa.

articles.title: Miembros de UMDC festejan dia de fundacion del EPC
articles.content:
Miembros de UMDC festejan dia de fundacion del EPC
 Pyongyang, 24 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este miercoles en la explanada frente al Arco de Triunfo el baile de las miembros de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea en la capital en celebracion del 81o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					 El baile se inicio con las melodias de canciones "Viva el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung" y "Cancion del Ejercito Popular de Corea".
					
					 Los participantes bailaron recordando las imborrables proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien presento la autoctona linea de construccion de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, fundo el ejercito revolucionario del pueblo y vencio con la inteligencia extraordinaria, destacado arte de mando militar, ferrea voluntad y audacia incomparable a los dos imperialismos en una generacion.
					
					 Al bailar al son de "Nuestro General es el mejor" y otras canciones, demostraron el infinito respeto al Generalisimo Kim Jong Il quien con la bandera del Songun en alto fortalecio el EPC como invencible ejercito de flor y nata fuerte en la ideologia y conviccion y elevo al maximo la dignidad y el poderio estatal de la Corea socialista. 
					
					 Aumentaron el clima festivo la "Cancion de la mujer", "Campanula", "Ongheya" y otras canciones que demuestran el honor y dignidad de las mujeres coreanas quienes gozan de una vida feliz en la patria socialista defendida por el ejercito revolucionario sin rival del monte Paektu.
					
					 El baile terminado con la cancion "Defenderemos a costa de la vida al General Kim Jong Un" demostro bien el fervor revolucionario de las mujeres coreanas de hacer contribucion activa a la defensa de la patria y la prosperidad nacional en pleno acato a la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y el espiritu del pleno de marzo de 2013 del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
